title: Tracking Issue for `destructuring_assignment`

labels.name: T-lang
labels.description: Relevant to the language team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: C-tracking-issue
labels.description: Category: A tracking issue for an RFC or an unstable feature.

labels.name: disposition-merge
labels.description: This issue / PR is in PFCP or FCP with a disposition to merge it.

labels.name: finished-final-comment-period
labels.description: The final comment period is finished for this PR / Issue.

body:
This is a tracking issue for the RFC "Destructuring assignment" (https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2909).
The feature gate for the issue is `#![feature(destructuring_assignment)]`.

### About tracking issues

Tracking issues are used to record the overall progress of implementation.
They are also uses as hubs connecting to other relevant issues, e.g., bugs or open design questions.
A tracking issue is however *not* meant for large scale discussion, questions, or bug reports about a feature.
Instead, open a dedicated issue for the specific matter and add the relevant feature gate label.

### Steps

- [x] Open a pull request: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71156
	- [x] Tuples (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78748)
    - [x] Structs and slices (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78836)
    - [x] `_` expressions (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79016)
- [x] Open an RFC: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2909.
- [x] Adjust documentation ([see instructions on rustc-dev-guide][doc-guide])
- [x] Stabilization PR (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90521)

[stabilization-guide]: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/stabilization_guide.html#stabilization-pr
[doc-guide]: https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/stabilization_guide.html#documentation-prs

### Implementation history

The initial implementation was carried out in three steps by @fanzier (split out from an initial implementation, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/71156):
- Implementing destructuring support for tuples: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78748
- Implementing destructuring support for structs and slices: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78836
- Implementing destructuring support for `_` expressions: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/79016
